IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: VARIETY OF EASTERN TENNESSEE'S PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO PROVIDE FUNDING AND SERVICES FOR PROGRAMS THAT STRIVE TO IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR UNDERPRIVILEDGED, PHYSICALLY AND MENTALLY CHALLENGED, ILL, ABUSED, NEGLECTED AND ABANDONED CHILDREN IN EASTERN TENNESSEE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSIST AT-RISK, PHYSICALLY CHALLENGED, ABUSED AND NEGLECTED CHILDREN.
IRS990.Desc: VARIETY PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO VARIOUS LOCAL CHILDREN'S CHARITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: KIDS ON THE GO - VARIETY PROVIDED WHEELCHAIRS AND ACCESSIBILITY EQUIPMENT FOR DISABLED CHILDREN.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: FACILITATED CHILDREN'S EVENTS, SUCH AS KIDS DAY AT THE ZOO AND MOVIE PREMIERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: VARIETY IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 501(C)(3), AND, ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS INCLUDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION AS A BENEFIT ONLY IF IT IS "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THAT THE TAX POSITION WOULD BE SUSTAINED IN A TAX EXAMINATION, WITH A TAX EXAMINATION BEING PRESUMED TO OCCUR. THE AMOUNT RECOGNIZED IS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF TAX BENEFIT THAT IS GREATER THAN 50% LIKELY OF BEING REALIZED ON EXAMINATION. FOR TAX POSITIONS NOT MEETING THE "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" TEST, NO TAX BENEFIT IS RECORDED. THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2018, THE ORGANIZATION HAS ACCRUED NO INTEREST AND NO PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. IT IS THE ORGANIZATION'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND/OR PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAX MATTERS IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE. THE ORGANIZATION FILES A U.S. FEDERAL INFORMATION TAX RETURN. VARIETY IS CURRENTLY OPEN TO AUDIT UNDER THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR THE YEARS ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2014 THROUGH 2017.
EXPENSES REPORTED ON PAGE 9, LINE 8B ATTRIBUTABLE TO SPECIAL EVENTS. 49,909.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AGENCY VISITS ARE CONDUCTED FOR EACH GRANT DISTRIBUTION TO ENSURE THAT THE GRANT FUNDS ARE BEING SPENT AS DESCRIBED IN THE GRANT REQUEST. SOME ORGANIZATIONS PROVIDE DOCUMENTATION SHOWING RESULTS FROM THE FUNDING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF FORM 990 IS APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND SIGNED BY THE PRESIDENT BEFORE IT IS FILED. THE ENTIRE BOARD IS THEN PROVIDED A COPY OF THE 990 AT THE NEXT BOARD MEETING.
